{"id":499553844,"lang":"cpp","time":"1 year, 2 months","timestamp":1622228769,"status_display":"Accepted","runtime":"24 ms","url":"/submissions/detail/499553844/","is_pending":"Not Pending","title":"Find Pivot Index","memory":"30.9 MB","code":"class Solution {\npublic:\n    int pivotIndex(vector<int>& nums) {\n        int leftsum =0;\n        int totalsum =0;\n        // We will maintain a running leftsum \n        for(int i =0;i<nums.size();i++){\n            totalsum+=nums[i];\n        }\n        for(int i=0;i<nums.size();i++){\n            if(totalsum -nums[i]-leftsum == leftsum){\n                return i;\n            }\n            leftsum+=nums[i];\n        }\n        return -1;\n    }\n};","compare_result":"","title_slug":"find-pivot-index"}
